```{python}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
import urllib.request
import re

username = "siavashhabibi1993"
repo = "ETABSPY-public"
branch = "main"

readme_url = f"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/{username}/{repo}/{branch}/README.md"
image_base = f"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/{username}/{repo}/{branch}/"

with urllib.request.urlopen(readme_url) as response:
    content = response.read().decode()

def fix_images(md, base):
    md = re.sub(
        r'!\[([^\]]*)\]\((?!http)([^)]+)\)',
        lambda m: f'![{m.group(1)}]({base}{m.group(2)})',
        md
    )
    md = re.sub(
        r'<img([^>]*?)src=["\'](?!http)([^"\']+)["\']',
        lambda m: f'<img{m.group(1)}src="{base}{m.group(2)}"',
        md
    )
    return md

content = fix_images(content, image_base)
print(content)
```
